SELECT case COUNT(*) when 0 then 'sights_1' ELSE CONCAT('sights_',MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(sights_num,8) AS DECIMAL))+1) END AS save_point_num FROM tb_sights
INSERT INTO tb_sights (sights_num, si_num, m_id, sights_cate_num, sights_name, sights_photo, sights_detail, sights_lat, sights_long, sights_addr, sights_web, sights_tel, sights_start_time, sights_close_time) VALUES( #{sightsNum}, #{siNum}, #{mId}, #{sightsCateNum}, #{sightsName}, #{sightsPhoto}, #{sightsDetail}, #{sightsLat}, #{sightsLong}, #{sightsAddr}, #{sightsWeb}, #{sightsTel}, #{sightsStartTime}, #{sightsCloseTime})
mapper.select: SELECT s.sights_num,s.sights_name, s.sights_detail,s.sights_photo,s.sights_addr,sc.sights_cate_num,sc.sights_type FROM tb_sights AS s INNER JOIN tb_si AS si INNER JOIN tb_sights_cate AS sc ON s.si_num = si.si_num AND sc.sights_cate_num = s.sights_cate_num WHERE si.si_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')

SELECT b.*, (case when sightsOpen = '곧 마감' then 'bg-danger' when sightsOpen = '영업중' then 'bg-warning' when sightsOpen = '영업종료' then 'bg-secondary' ELSE '' END ) AS btnColor FROM (SELECT s.*, sc.sights_type, (case when TIMEDIFF(sights_close_time,TIME(NOW())) BETWEEN TIME('00:00:00') AND TIME('00:30:00') then '곧 마감' when sights_start_time <= TIME(NOW()) AND sights_close_time >= TIME(NOW()) then '영업중' when sights_start_time > TIME(NOW()) AND sights_close_time < TIME(NOW()) then '영업마감' ELSE '' END) AS sightsOpen FROM tb_sights AS s INNER join tb_sights_cate AS sc ON s.sights_cate_num = sc.sights_cate_num ) AS b WHERE sights_num =#{sightsNum}
